question: I would be very grateful if you could interpret my dream.
answer:
QUESTION
Assalaam Alaikum wa ratullahi wa baraktauh, Dear Imam, I would be very grateful if you could interpret my dream. First though, Last night I prayed during the night and ask Allah SWT to give me a dream that would tell me if I should anticipate a proposal from a man my father met last week. Last night I dreamed that I was breastfeeding a baby. Please tell me if this has any significance to my dua and if it does please tell me what it means. If it does not, I would still be very grateful if you could interpret it anyway. May Allah reward you for you efforts. Aammen.
ANSWER


Share:
Istikhaara literally means to seek good.

1. The purpose of Istikhaara is to seek the guidance of Allah whether a
matter is good or not, for example, a girl receives a proposal of marriage
and is unsure whether she should accept the proposal or not. Istikhaara is
not made to merely determine anticipation of a proposal.
2. Breastfeeding indicates Barakah and blessing.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
